ch.linetic.gui.component

Class GridComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.linetic.gui.component.Component
      • ch.linetic.gui.component.GridComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyzerGridComponent

    public class GridComponent
extends Component
    A GridComponent is a component that act as a grid for other components i.e. We can add as many component as we want with the put(Component c) function and it automatically allocate the write amount of space for each component in order to display everything as a grid. It is important that the components of the grid can be setup dynamically (using the function setup(x,y,width,height)) without causing any problems as it's the grid itself that setup the size and position of all the components.
    Author:
    ketsio

        public GridComponent(processing.core.PApplet parrent,
             int x,
             int y,
             int width,
             int height,
             int length)
        Creates a GridComponent given its size, position and the number of component to be added to the grid
        Parameters:
        parrent - the PApplet of the application
        x - the x coordinate of the position
        y - the y coordinate of the position
        width - the width of the grid
        height - the height of the grid
        length - the number of components
